Reference

Package

tabr

tabr: Music notation syntax, manipulation, analysis and transcription in R.

Create tablature

Functions for writing and rendering LilyPond files.

tab()

Create tablature

lilypond()

Save score to LilyPond file

tabr_options()

Options

Organizing music

Functions for hierarchical music notation organization.

phrase() p()

Create a musical phrase

track()

Create a music track

trackbind()

Bind track tables

score()

Create a music score

Phrase construction

Functions for describing, assembling and connecting musical phrases.

pc() pn()

Concatenate and repeat

rest()

Create rests

tie() untie()

Tied notes

notate()

Add text to music staff

hp()

Hammer ons and pull offs

tuplet() triplet()

Tuplets

transpose() tp()

Transpose pitch

sf_phrase() sfp() sf_note() sfn()

Create a musical phrase from string/fret combinations

Repeats

Functions to assist with repeated sections of music.

rp() pct() volta()

Repeat phrases

Chords

Functions for chord transcription.

chord_set()

Generate a chord set

Phrase validation and coercion

Functions for checking and decomposing phrases objects.

as_phrase() phrasey() notify() phrase_notes() phrase_info() phrase_strings() notable()

Phrase validation and coercion

Key signature helpers

Functions providing key information and specification

keys() key_is_natural() key_is_sharp() key_is_flat() key_n_sharps() key_n_flats() key_is_major() key_is_minor()

Key signatures

Scale helpers

Functions for working with musical scales

scale_degree() scale_note() note_in_scale()

Scale degrees and mappings

scale_diatonic() scale_major() scale_minor() scale_harmonic_minor() scale_hungarian_minor() scale_melodic_minor() scale_jazz_minor() scale_chromatic()

Scale helpers

Mode helpers

Functions for working with musical modes

modes() is_mode() mode_rotate() mode_modern() mode_ionian() mode_dorian() mode_phrygian() mode_lydian() mode_mixolydian() mode_aeolian() mode_locrian()

Mode helpers

Interval helpers

Functions for calculating musical intervals

pitch_interval() scale_interval() tuning_intervals()

Interval helpers

interval_semitones()

Interval semitones

Chord helpers

Functions for constructing and manipulating chord strings

chord_rank() chord_order() chord_sort()

Rank, order and sort chords and notes

chord_break()

Broken chords

chord_invert()

Chord inversion

chord_arpeggiate()

Arpeggiate a chord

chord_root() chord_top() chord_slice()

Extract notes from chords

chord_is_diatonic()

Check if a chord is diatonic

chord_is_major() chord_is_minor()

Check if a chord is major or minor

scale_chords()

Diatonic chords

dyad()

Construct a dyad

chord_min() chord_maj() chord_min7() chord_dom7() chord_7s5() chord_maj7() chord_min6() chord_maj6() chord_dim() chord_dim7() chord_m7b5() chord_aug() chord_5() chord_sus2() chord_sus4() chord_dom9() chord_7s9() chord_maj9() chord_add9() chord_min9() chord_madd9() chord_min11() chord_7s11() chord_maj7s11() chord_11() chord_maj11() chord_13() chord_min13() chord_maj13() xm() xM() xm7() x7() x7s5() xM7() xm6() xM6() xdim() xdim7() xm7b5() xaug() x5() xs2() xs4() x9() x7s9() xM9() xadd9() xm9() xma9() xm11() x7s11() xM7s11() x_11() xM11() x_13() xm13() xM13()

Chord constructors

chord_def()

Define chords

lp_chord_id() lp_chord_mod()

LilyPond chord notation

gc_info() gc_fretboard() gc_notes() chord_is_known() chord_name_split() chord_name_root() chord_name_mod()

Chord mapping

Note and pitch helpers

Functions for manipulating noteworthy strings

note_is_natural() note_is_accidental() note_is_flat() note_is_sharp() naturalize() sharpen_flat() flatten_sharp() note_set_key() pretty_notes()

Note naturalness and keys

n_steps() n_notes() n_chords() n_octaves() tally_notes() tally_pitches() tally_octaves() distinct_notes() distinct_pitches() distinct_octaves() pitch_range() semitone_range() semitone_span() octave_range() octave_span() octave_type() accidental_type() time_format()

Noteworthy string metadata

note_slice() note_rotate() note_shift() note_arpeggiate()

Slice, rotate, shift and arpeggiate notes

is_note() is_chord() noteworthy() is_diatonic() as_noteworthy()

Check note and chord validity

note_is_equal() note_is_identical() pitch_is_equal() pitch_is_identical() octave_is_equal() octave_is_identical()

Note, pitch and chord equivalence

pitch_freq() pitch_semitones() chord_freq() chord_semitones() freq_pitch() freq_semitones()

Pitch-frequency conversion

Plots (non-tablature visualizations)

Functions for musical plots and diagrams

fretboard_plot()

Fretboard plot

MIDI conversion

Functions for converting MIDI files with LilyPond

midily()

Convert MIDI to LilyPond file

miditab()

Convert MIDI to tablature

Datasets

tabrSyntax

tabr syntax.

tunings

Predefined instrument tunings.

mainIntervals

Main musical intervals.

guitarChords

Predefined guitar chords.
